title: Han Keong
author: Han Keong
content: Another asian team just won against a better team   Literally very proud being asian right now.

comments.author: Lingesh_67
comments.body: They just won on the group stage so chill man

comments.author: Lenny Lau
comments.body: LOL It might looks like nothing but being able to defect Spain and Portugal is huge for us MAN

comments.author: Lingesh_67
comments.body: HAHAH CHILL CHILL I'm not denying the win. It's just the group stage. That's all I'm saying

comments.author: Han Keong
comments.body: Relax we still have to go thru the round of 16. Thats went the quarter final like be confirmed so I places bets during those rounds.

comments.author: Kai Xuan
comments.body: Portugal didn't have to worry about that lost since they already know that they going to be on the top 16.

comments.author: Lingesh_67
comments.body: Yea that's true maybe we cant keep our hopes too high.  I heard bets. What do you mean by that?

comments.author: Han Keong
comments.body: Well since the world cup begin, I have been placing bets on BK8 platform. So far I have won a couple of matches hehee bk8 has a good prediction on which team to bet

comments.author: Lenny Lau
comments.body: I guess watch and placing bet is more hyper cause there is money on the line HAHAHA sounds like fun and stress

comments.author: Lingesh_67
comments.body: Man there too many good team on the top 16   Really?? I will check out myself... BK8 right? I can place some bet to hehe

comments.author: Han Keong
comments.body: The platform is user friendly and have great new comers bonus like 300% more. And the is more prizes if you managed to predict the score of the game correctly

comments.author: GraceRoss
comments.body: I'm betting on Argentina today. How about you guys? Place your bets now at the ole777 platform.

comments.author: jakdanyel
comments.body: Asian and African countries have won unexpected matches. There can always be such results in group matches. The main thing is to get a win in the quarter-finals and the next rounds. Probably in the last 16 round these teams will be eliminated from the tournament. Maybe the tour of Japan can pass. However, they are also eliminated from the tournament in the quarterfinals.
